sentence: move the right purple block to the rear right side of the block that you moved at the first time
move the right purple block to the rear right side of the left purple block

straighten and move the rearmost purple block to the rear right of the initially moved purple block so that the rear right corner of the moved block touches the non-metal purple block's front left corner
straighten and move the rearmost purple block to the rear right of the metal purple block so that its front left corner meets the rear right corner metal purple block
